transformations.name: SplitDailyFromWeekly
transformations.description: Conditionally distributing the data in indicator groups, based on columns '{1}'

transformations.name: JoinWithDate
transformations.description: Add second stream to the join from settings

scriptLines: SelectRequiredColumns split(indicator == 'Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k' || indicator == 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k',
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
